trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en abstrakt klasse for formatering støttetjenestene til en tekstlinje.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor must be called for every class that is inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren må kalles for hver klasse som er arvet fra <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden fra toppen i opprinnelige for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer grunnleggende avstanden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Create a collapsed line based on collapsed text properties.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en skjult linje basert på Egenskaper skjult tekst.

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties"></xref> objects that represent the collapsed text properties.
trans-unit.target: En liste over <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties"> </xref> objekter som representerer egenskapene skjulte teksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> value that represents a collapsed line that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref> verdi som representerer en skjult linje som kan vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters following the last character of the line that may trigger reformatting of the current line.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet tegn som følger det siste tegnet i linjen som kan utløse formatere av gjeldende linje.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som Representer antall tegn.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle behandlet ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref> objektet basert på den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref> is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objektet som den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref> gjengis.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> value that represents the drawing origin.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> verdien som representerer tegnet origo.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes"></xref> value that indicates the inversion of the horizontal and vertical axes of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: En nummererte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes"> </xref> verdi som angir inversjon av vannrette og y-aksen på tegning overflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top-most to bottom-most black pixel in a line.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden fra øverste til nederst svart pikselbredden i en linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the extent distance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer omfanget avstanden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous character hit after backspacing.
trans-unit.target: Henter det forrige tegnet nådde etter slette bakover.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object after backspacing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objekt etter slette bakover.

trans-unit.source: Gets the character hit corresponding to the specified distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: Henter tegn-treff som tilsvarer den angitte avstanden fra begynnelsen av linjen.

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: Teksten flytretningen bestemmer hvordan avstanden måles.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>verdi som angir avstanden fra begynnelsen av linjen.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The object at the specified distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: Den objektet i den angitte distance fra begynnelsen av linjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the beginning of the line to the specified character hit.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden fra begynnelsen av linjen til det angitte tegnet hit.

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: Teksten flytretningen bestemmer hvordan avstanden måles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object whose distance you want to query.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objektet der avstanden du ønsker å foreta en spørring.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer avstanden fra begynnelsen av linjen.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for enumerating <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en opplisting for nummerering <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By enumerating through the list of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> objects, the text layout client can obtain glyph information for each text source character.
trans-unit.target: Ved å liste opp gjennom listen over <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun>objekter teksten oppsettet klienten finner symbol for hver tekst kildetegn.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that allows you to enumerate each <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting som gjør det mulig å liste opp hver <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> </xref> objekt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next character hit for caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: Henter tegnet nådde for synlig navigasjon.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object based on caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: Neste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objekt basert på synlig navigasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous character hit for caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: Henter det forrige tegnet nådde for navigasjon synlig.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> object based on caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: Forrige <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"> </xref> objekt basert på synlig navigeringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of bounding rectangles that represent the range of characters within a text line.
trans-unit.target: Henter en matrise av avgrensende rektangler som representerer området tegn i en tekstlinje.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the index of first character of specified range.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som representerer indeksen til første tegnet i angitte området.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of characters of the specified range.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som Representer antall tegn for det angitte området.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds"></xref> objects representing the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: En liste over <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds"> </xref> objekter som representerer det avgrensende rektangelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of collapsed text ranges after a line has been collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av skjulte teksten områder etter en linje er skjult.

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange"></xref> objects that represent the collapsed text.
trans-unit.target: En liste over <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange"> </xref> objekter som representerer den skjulte teksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the line when broken by line breaking process.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for linjen når de deles ved linjeskift prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Returverdien er `null` når linjen slutter på slutten av avsnittet.

trans-unit.source: The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A> method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Teksten formatering klienten kan sende returverdien tilbake som en parameter i <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A>metode, der verdien som skal brukes ved formatering neste linje i samme avsnitt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak"></xref> value that represents the line break.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak"> </xref> verdi som Representer linjeskift.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> objects in a text span that are contained within a line.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref> objekter i et område for tekst som befinner seg i en linje.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> objects contained within a text span.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref> objekter innenfor et område for tekst.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the line is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om linjen er skjult.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the line is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis linjen er skjult; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether content of the line overflows the specified paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om innholdet i linjen går ut over angitte avsnittet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, it the line overflows the specified paragraph width; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, den linjen går ut over bredden på angitte avsnittet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på en tekstlinje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text line height.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som angir teksten linje.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the text line is truncated in the middle of a word.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om tekstlinjen er avkortet midt i et ord.

trans-unit.source: The IsTruncated property value is set only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> is set to <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>, and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien IsTruncated er angitt bare når den <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>for <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>, og enkeltord er større enn formatering avsnittsbredden.</xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> </xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>

trans-unit.source: In such situation, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> setting.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>trunkerer linjen midt i ordet du overholder ønsket virkemåte angitt av <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>innstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> </xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text line is truncated in the middle of a word; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tekstlinjen er avkuttet midt i en word. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> posisjonen for den gjeldende linjen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som Representer antall <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"> </xref> posisjonen for den gjeldende.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the edge of the line's highest point to the baseline marker of the line.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden fra kanten av den linjen høyeste punktet til grunnleggende merket for linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the baseline distance of the marker.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer grunnleggende avstanden for indikatoren.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a marker for a list item.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på indikatoren for et listeelement.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the height of the marker.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer høyden på indikatoren.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of newline characters at the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall linjeskifttegn på slutten av en linje.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of newline characters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som Representer antall linjeskifttegn.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend beyond the bottom alignment edge of a line.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden som svarte går utover justering nederst i en linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the overhang after distance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer henging etter avstanden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend prior to the left leading alignment edge of the line.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden som svarte går før venstre innledende justering kant av linjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the overhang leading distance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer henging innledende avstanden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend following the right trailing alignment edge of the line.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden svarte utvide følgende høyre etterfølgende justering kant av linjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the overhang trailing distance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer henging etterfølgende avstanden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir PixelsPerDip teksten skal gjengis.

trans-unit.source: The current PixelsPerDip value.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende PixelsPerDip verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden fra begynnelsen av et avsnitt til startpunktet for en linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>verdien som representerer avstanden fra begynnelsen av et avsnitt til startpunktet for en linje.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the line of text.
trans-unit.target: Henter avstanden fra toppen i opprinnelige på tekstlinjen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the text baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>verdi som representerer teksten grunnleggende avstanden.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the text and any other content in the line.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på teksten og annet innhold i linjen.

trans-unit.source: The TextHeight may differ from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> property if the client specified the line height.
trans-unit.target: TextHeight kan være forskjellig fra den <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A>egenskapen hvis klienten angitt linjehøyden på.</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>verdi.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet mellomrom kodepunkt forbi det siste tegnet i ikke-tomme i en linje.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som representerer antallet mellomrom kodepunkt forbi det siste tegnet for ikke-tomme i en linje.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: Henter bredden på en tekstlinje, uten avsluttende mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text line width, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer linjebredden tekst, uten avsluttende mellomrom.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: Henter bredden på en tekstlinje, inkludert etterfølgende mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text line width, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer linjebredden tekst, inkludert etterfølgende mellomrom.</xref:System.Double>
